title: Laboratory Integration in Agricultural Education
description: Teaching important science concepts using agriculture as the context. Assisting current agriculture teachers in identifying proper pedagogical strategies to integrate agriscience activities and laboratories into existing high school agriculture courses. Emphasis on appropriate teaching methods and techniques, curriculum integration and application, and classroom resources. 3 seminars.
prerequisites: BIO 112 or BIO 115 or BIO 161; AGED 438; and either enrollment in MS degree in Agricultural Education or currently teaching agriscience
